dt-option.name: searchBuilder.liveSearch

type.description: Enable live search on SearchBuilder input (`true`), or disable and show a "Search" button to trigger the search operation (`false`).

dt-option.description:
This option is an alias to `-feature searchBuilder.liveSearch`, which should be preferred when using DataTables 2+. It can be used to configure SearchBuilder regardless of how the panes are inserted into the document (`-init layout` or `-button searchBuilder`).
Please refer to the documentation for `-feature searchBuilder.liveSearch` for full details of this option.
